Desc: Parses an HL7/EDI/X12 message and extracts Z segments which it returns in a Lua table.

Returns.Desc: A lua table with the Z segments parsed out.

SummaryLine: Parses an HL7/EDI/X12 message for Z-zegments without a vmd.

SeeAlso.Title: Parsing Z segments without a vmd.

Title: hl7.zsegment.parse

compact.Desc: If true then the parsed tree will push all data to the lowest level <u>boolean</u>.
